article_title: Mississippi is still in poor health and still rejecting the Medicaid expansion
article_text: WASHINGTON -- Mississippi's legacy of poor health continued in 2015 as the Magnolia State finished 49th among the 50 states in the annual "America's Health Rankings," released Thursday by the United Health Foundation.
